title: Insider Threat Alert Triage
description: A SOC analyst receives an alert from a User and Entity Behavior Analytics (UEBA) tool that a user has downloaded an unusually large amount of data.

tasks.description: Review the UEBA alert details, including the user, the amount of data downloaded, and the source.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst retrieves the details of the behavioral anomaly.

tasks.description: Check with the user's manager to see if there is a legitimate business reason for the large download.
tasks.expected_outcome: The manager confirms there is no legitimate reason for the activity.

tasks.description: Confirm the activity is suspicious and escalate to the insider threat team for a full investigation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst correctly identifies a potential insider threat and escalates it to the appropriate team.
